document_name: ProDoc Innovative Entrepreneurship for Sustainable Employment

outputs.output_descr: The project is implemented jointly with the Ministry of Economy of Moldova and has the goal to establish career centers in several locations, training and assisting qualified unemployed and graduates in obtaining relevant employment in Moldova, preventing brain-drain and supporting economic growth. The creation of career centers is based on the SYSLAB (Systems Laboratory for Innovation and Employment) concept. The concept includes modern job-seeking methods, entrepreneurship, systematic business and person-to-person networks, modern sales techniques etc
